황혼의 사제:
[ 어둠의 제전 참가 ]
Even as I speak, the Festival of Darkness is taking place at the Oracle of Dawn. Speak with the Festival Guide there for a detailed explanation of the festival.
If you wish to participate, you must pay an admission fee of seal stones.
Are you ready to go to the Oracle of Dawn?
